title: Price
description: A monetary amount with currency and optional billing period. Used across catalog item types for product prices, nightly hotel rates, salary ranges, rental costs, and similar monetary values.

amount.description: Monetary amount in the specified currency.

period.description: Billing period. 'night' for hotel rates, 'month' or 'year' for salaries and rentals, 'one_time' for purchase prices. Omit when the period is obvious from context (e.g., a vehicle price is always one-time).
